title: How many soldiers died in Kargil war? - Quora

response.answer_text: Indian official figures (Loss to India) 527 killed1,363 wounded1 prisoner of war1 fighter jet shot down1 fighter jet crashed1 helicopter shot downPakistani claims 1,600 (as claimed by Musharraf)Independent figures 700 killedPakistani figures (Loss to pakistan) 453 killed (Pakistan army claim)8 prisoner of warOther Pakistani claims 357 killed and 665+ wounded (according to Pervez Musharraf)2,700—4,000 killed (according to Nawaz Sharif)Indian claims 737+—1,200 killed (249 dead bodies recovered in Indian territory, of which 244 dead bodies were buried)1000+ wounded

I don't know numbers that I can tell you how many soldiers had died. But if we talk about proportions then we lost large number of soldiers as compared to Pakistan's.Kargil war was not stopped there at 1999, it's still going on by the name of ceasefire. We are saving borders & still we are loosing our people. I think we have no numbers that we can tell how many soldiers had given sacrifices & are giving still now.The number will be always uncertain.
